channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: Why Economic Coercion Over Greenland Would Backfire
item.description: Phil Luck examines the critical questions around the Trump administration’s recent threats to impose tariffs on European allies in connection with Greenland.

item.title: Why U.S.-Mexico Security Cooperation Is Still Falling Short for Washington
item.description: CSIS Americas experts evaluate the state of U.S.-Mexico security cooperation and chart the areas where it continues to fall short.
